name: Rat Prince
description:
Rat Prince. A derogatory moniker, embraced as a term of endearment among the slums. He is a thief turned folk hero. Robbing the rich; feeding the poor. 

That is, until he was trailed home. The oppressive Redguard took his only possession, an ancient family heirloom, and burnt his house to the ground. He now sits in a cell, awaiting his fate. But he is not alone...

Meet the team!

Stormborg on Twitch

SquirrelTeam6ix on Twitch

BJCampolo on Twitch

PeachyKM on Twitch

Thank you all for checking out the game!  If you would like to see more of the world that this game is based on, make sure to check out Stormborg and SquirrelTeam6ix on Twitch for development of that game.

V2 UPDATE:

The original submission is in tact, but the V2 version contains changes that prevents a potentially game breaking scenario.  It also contains a fix for an issue where the final dialog was not being shown.  Lastly, the WebGL version doesn't play too well if you sneak to the north, so I changed the sneak key from Ctrl to Shift, sorry to anyone who had issue with that!
